PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01462018-02-15,  ,  ,  GAC, 
ActJustice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Act (Sergei Magnitsky Law)
SubjectRegulations Amending the Justice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the JUSTICE FOR VICTIMS OF CORRUPT FOREIGN OFFICIALS REGULATIONS in order to add to the list one foreign national who, in the opinion of the Governor in Council is responsible for or complicit in gross violations of internationally recognized human rights against individuals in Myanmar who seek to obtain, exercise, defend or promote internationally recognized human rights and freedoms.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0025 Publication Date: 2018-03-07
AttachmentsAttachment
